attributes.action: That people on benefits must do some type of community work or working from home. Nobody should find benefits are better than work.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that citizens should not be able to obtain money from the state without doing something for that money. They should all do something whether that is doing something from home or doing something for the community. Any who does not comply would have benefits stopped. Nobody should better off on benefits , they should be unattractive as possible.
